column4: anybody know any tricks on increasing the overall volume of the sound card?  i get *much* louder sound, with no distortion, when i boot this laptop into windows
sounds good. how does that work
just one of the controls in the mixer controls./
everything in the mixer is up to max
i don't have any switches that say amplifier
then perhaps your chipset type is not quite perfectly supported by the driver. There are many variants.
anyhow, try to check which controls you have with 'amixer controls' just to double check.
you may even have one of those card without a hw volume control, they need the 'softvol' ALSA plugin.
yeah "amixer controls" shows stuff i already have access to
i dunno, it's ALC662 using hda intel
the name may be not entirely obvious. But maybe one of the other cases apply.
there are dozens of variants of intel HDA, all with very subtly different mixer registers.
try 'modinfo snd-hda-intel', the driver modules has some parameters to select particular variants.
there's a "model" parameter, but no list of the models i can use
the list is in the manual and docs.
i'm seeing suggestions to use "model=laptop" option. i'll try that.
